timing.title: When should I give the return gift?
timing.content: It's best to give the return gift within 1-2 months of receiving the congratulatory gift.

wrapping.title: How should I wrap the gift?
wrapping.content: Use formal gift wrapping with a noshi (ceremonial paper)

amount.title: What is the appropriate amount?
amount.content: Generally, the return gift should be about half the value of the received gift.
